summary: This document appears to be a daily assignment log or timesheet for a staff member named 'Noel, T' at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, covering dates in July and August 2019. It records shift assignments, leave, and overtime, and is significant as it provides a timeline of staff activity at the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held prior to his death.

locations: MCC New York, New York, NY
keyFacts: This is a staff assignment record from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 12, 2019.
The log tracks the assignments of a staff member 'Noel, T' for the third quarter of 2019, including posts in Special Housing Units (SHU) and other units.
The document provides a timeline of staff presence and activity at the facility in the months leading up to and including Jeffrey Epstein's death in August 2019.
